name: Charge Up (MO-Nasser)
description:
Charge Up is a 3D top-down rogue-like game where magnets help each other survive in a field of bullets by defusing their terror using the magnetic pull between them.

They can't get too close or they get destroyed. If they grow apart from each other they lose their magnetic force so don't let them lose it.

This is our submit for GGJ 2022
